articles.author: Debby Wu, Josh Wingrove, Shawn Donnan
articles.title: Apple, Nvidia Score Reprieve from Trump Tariffs With Exemptions - Bloomberg
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s administration exempted smartphones, computers and other electronics from its so-called reciprocal tariffs, representing a major reprieve for global technology manufacturers including Apple Inc. and Nvidia Corp. even if it proves a te…
